0.1.name: wordpress/bible-search
0.1.description:
eBible.com is a Bible site that can be instantly integrated into your WordPress blog with this plugin. After installing and positioning the widget, your users will be able to search the Bible powered by eBible.com's powerful search engine.

See http://ebible.com/developers for more information on eBible which this plugin uses
